body_html:
Got v1.8.0 working with cuda 9.2 and cudnn 7.1, followed steps in this link.

This is the wheel I built. (Note, I did not get nccl working, as I am not using multi-GPU I commented "import nccl" out after installing)

body:
Got v1.8.0 working with cuda 9.2 and cudnn 7.1, followed steps in this [link](https://gist.github.com/74th/31eacbbac6351649caa417b19231f09e).

This is the [wheel](https://drive.google.com/open?id=11ZCmUC-Daxs548O1VD857pUA0r7UpP00) I built. (Note, I did not get nccl working, as I am not using multi-GPU I commented "import nccl" out after installing)
